### Heavy Duty Mechanic Services
#### AAFC, Brandon Research and Development Centre (BRDC)

#### Solicitation Summary

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada’s Research Centre at Brandon, Manitoba, is seeking a qualified service provider to deliver Heavy Duty Mechanic Services, as outlined in this solicitation. The contract will be awarded for a period of one year, with an option to extend up to three additional one-year periods.

#### Description

The contracting authority requires a supplier to provide heavy equipment maintenance and repair services on an “as and when required” basis. This service will be delivered to the Identified Users at the  Brandon Research and Development Centre.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation of bids will be based on the entire requirement outlined in this solicitation. Bids will be assessed according to technical and financial evaluation criteria outlined in the solicitation documents.

#### Security Requirements

There are no security requirements associated with this solicitation.

#### Tender Submission Details

This solicitation allows bidders to use the CPC Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation to transmit their bid electronically. Bidders must refer to Part 2 entitled Bidder Instructions, and Part 3 entitled Bid Preparation Instructions of the bid solicitation for further information.
